translation.en: Nice ride.
It does the job.
What job, delivering pizzas?
Well, it's not the ride, it's the rider.
translation.es: Pues lo importante es quién monta.

translation.en: What the hell was that? What?
Hey! You talking to my girl?
-Oh, shit. Here we go. -Yeah.
She was just admiring my ride.
My ride.
My grandma's Buick could smoke that piece of shit, trailer trash.
translation.es: El Buick de mi abuela le gana a esa mierda.

translation.en: Well, what about your daddy's Viper?
This beast's got 500 horsepower and a Borla exhaust system.
translation.es: Esta bestia tiene 500 caballos y un sistema Borla.

translation.en: It does 0 to 60 in, like, 4.3 seconds.
-That's about right. -That's about right.
-Yeah. -Wow. You can read the brochure.
-Let's make it happen. -Bring it.
Why don't you nice boys let your cars do the talking?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no lo resuelven con los autos?

translation.en: I only race for pink slips.
translation.es: El que pierda, pierde el auto.

translation.en: This car goes for 80 grand.
What would I do with a broken-ass piece of shit like that? Ooh!
How about me?
Winner gets me.
translation.es: El que gane... me tendrá a mí.

translation.en: Woo!
Go, go, go!
( shouting ) Buzz off, baby!
translation.es: ¡Esta carrera va a estar de madre!

translation.en: First one out the other side.
Baby! Let's go!
Ready, boys? Make it interesting, Clay. ( engines revving )
Shit!
Yeah!
I thought you loved me.
Oh, well.
What the hell?
Guess I got a new date for prom.
-Clay, stop the car! -Shut up!
-Clay, stop the car! -Shut up!
Stop it!
Clay, please stop! Please stop!
Can I get a copy of that?
You think this is a joke, huh?
You see Ken and Barbie over there?
They're gonna walk out of here without even a slap on the wrist.
translation.es: Van a salir de aquí sin un regaño.

translation.en: Mommy and Daddy are too hooked up.
But I like screw-ups like you.
translation.es: Me gustan los fracasados como tú.

translation.en: You know why?
translation.es: Me gustan los fracasados como tú. ¿Sabes por qué? Porque estoy 100% seguro de que vas a la cárcel.

translation.en: 'Cause you're 100 percent guaranteed conviction.
translation.es: ¿Sabes por qué? Porque estoy 100% seguro de que vas a la cárcel.

translation.en: -Where's my car? -I crushed it. You did what?
-Sit down! -Easy. Easy.
You're done. You understand me?
translation.es: -¡Siéntate! Se acabó. -Calma. Se acabó. ¿Entiendes? Se acabó.

translation.en: You're done. And all before your 18th birthday. Now sit down. ( knocking)
Sean.
What the hell were you thinkin', huh?
Mrs. Boswell? Please.
It's--it's Miss.
Officer, is it illegal to smoke in here?
It's a tough state. And it's a pretty clear-cut case.
translation.es: Este es un asunto clarísimo y la condena es severa.

translation.en: He'll be lucky if they don't try him as an adult.
This is our third town in two years.
translation.es: En los últimos 2 años hemos vivido en 3 ciudades.

translation.en: Your son's got two priors for reckless driving, willful destruction of property.
translation.es: Su hijo tiene historial de manejar disparatadamente.

translation.en: This makes it strike three.
They're definitely gonna want to get him off the streets.
translation.es: Van a querer mandarlo a la cárcel.

translation.en: Well, there's just got to be another way.
translation.es: Van a querer mandarlo a la cárcel. Tiene que haber una alternativa.

translation.en: So, where are we moving this time?
We are not moving anywhere.
I thought you were gonna be here on the 7th.
Today is the 7th.
Well, look, just hold on one second.
Come on in.
This is it.
You know, Sean, I was-- I was gonna be there.
translation.es: Sean, yo iba a ir a recibirte...

translation.en: But your mom, she said the 7th, see,
translation.es: pero tu mamá dijo que era el 7, ¿ves?

translation.en: and we're a day ahead of you in Japan.
translation.es: pero tu mamá dijo que era el 7, ¿ves? En Japón estamos un día adelantados.

translation.en: Well, you're here now, and that's good.
translation.es: Pues, ya estás aquí. Me alegro.

translation.en: So, how is your mom?
Where do I sleep?
Now, Sean, you know she had no other choice.
translation.es: Sean, sabes que no le quedó más remedio.

translation.en: I mean, it was either this or juvie hall,
translation.es: Si no venías, ibas al reformatorio.

translation.en: I mean, you just can't keep moving away
translation.es: Si no venías, ibas al reformatorio. Digo, no podían seguir mudándose.

translation.en: every time you get into trouble.
Worked for you.
translation.es: Digo, no podían seguir mudándose. Tú lo hiciste.

translation.en: Look, neither of us asked for this.
translation.es: Mira, ninguno de los dos quería esto.

translation.en: But I promised your mom I'd take care of you.
translation.es: Pero le prometí a tu madre que me ocuparía de ti.

translation.en: So you just go by the rules her and I agreed to,
translation.es: Así que cumple las reglas que acordamos...

translation.en: and I'm sure you'll manage just fine.
translation.es: Así que cumple las reglas que acordamos... -y te irá bien. -¿Reglas?

translation.en: Rules?
Yeah, rules. Real simple.
You go to school, you come back here right after.
translation.es: Vas a la escuela y vuelves acá inmediatamente.

translation.en: And I don't want to see or hear about you anywhere near a car.
translation.es: Y no quiero que tengas nada que ver con autos de ningún tipo.

translation.en: Here, the bedroom is yours.
Make yourself comfortable.
Lights out in ten.
translation.es: La luz se apaga a las 10.

translation.en: You got to be kiddin'.
-Wrong train. -Huh?
translation.es: Me equivoqué de tren. Soy nuevo.

translation.en: I'm new here.
-Boswell-kun? -Boswell, yes, ma'am. ( speaking Japanese )
Japanese food is like the Army.
translation.es: La comida japonesa es como el ejército.

translation.en: Don't ask, don't tell.
Name's Twinkie. Hey, I noticed you ain't have a laptop.
translation.es: Me dicen "Twinkie". Vi que no tenías computadora.

translation.en: Yeah?
I'll hook you up. Half price. No, I'm cool.
translation.es: Te vendo una, a mitad de precio.

translation.en: 60 percent off. Hmm?
translation.es: No. Te rebajo 60%, ya que somos hijos de militares.

translation.en: Since we're both army brats and everything.
translation.es: Te rebajo 60%, ya que somos hijos de militares.

translation.en: I ain't got no cash, man.
And I ain't an army brat.
translation.es: Y no soy hijo de militar.

translation.en: All right, all right. Well, what about a cell phone, huh?
Everybody needs a cell phone.
translation.es: Bueno, ¿quieres un teléfono celular? Todo el mundo quiere uno.

translation.en: No offense, but I'm probably not gonna be here
translation.es: No te ofendas... Voy a estar aquí muy poco tiempo y dudo que me aprenda tu nombre.

translation.en: long enough to remember your name.
translation.es: Voy a estar aquí muy poco tiempo y dudo que me aprenda tu nombre.

translation.en: Then you gonna need some new shoes to book town with, man.
translation.es: Voy a estar aquí muy poco tiempo y dudo que me aprenda tu nombre. Entonces necesitarás un par de zapatos.

translation.en: You like Michael Jordan?
translation.es: Entonces necesitarás un par de zapatos. ¿Te gusta Michael Jordan? A mí me encanta.

translation.en: I love Michael Jordan.
translation.es: ¿Te gusta Michael Jordan? A mí me encanta.

translation.en: Check this out.
Brand new Jordans. Not even out yet.
translation.es: Nuevos. No han salido al mercado.

translation.en: LeBron James couldn't even get his hands on those.
translation.es: Ni siquiera LeBron James los tiene.

translation.en: You selling that Sparco steering wheel?
Hell, no. That's mine right there.
translation.es: ¿Estás vendiendo ese timón Sparco? No, carajo. Eso es mío.

translation.en: Man, I even paid retail for it.
What you drive?
Oh, my ride?
-Yeah. -Yeah. My ride's one of a kind.
Show me.
Thought you weren't stickin' around.
All right.
Slamming, huh? Look at that car.
At least let me drive.
Y'all better have some real cars around here.
Okay. I see somebody got jokes, huh? Well, all right.
translation.es: Ya veo, qué bromista. Está bien.

translation.en: I don't know if you're ready for them, though.
You look a little nervous.
translation.es: No sé si estarás preparado. Te ves nervioso.

translation.en: What up, Tosh?
For when you blow your wad, man.
Hear that?
It's still not right for the way I drive.
translation.es: Todavía no está como me gusta.

translation.en: I don't need a computer to tell me about
translation.es: [N]¡Porque manejas mal! ¿Ves? No necesito que me lo diga una computadora.

translation.en: my throttle response.
translation.es: No necesito que me lo diga una computadora.

translation.en: Okay. Then we're done here.
You wouldn't have that problem with a V8. Boys.
translation.es: Con un motor V8 no tendrías ese problema.

translation.en: All they care about is who's got the biggest engine.
translation.es: ¡Los hombres! Sólo les preocupa quién tiene el motor más grande.

translation.en: I'm a guy. It's in my DNA.
translation.es: Sólo les preocupa quién tiene el motor más grande. Soy hombre. Lo llevo en mi ADN.

translation.en: So y'all race with these things, huh? Cute little toys.
You know, I almost didn't recognize you without your slippers on.
translation.es: No te reconocí sin tus chancletas.

translation.en: Don't you mean wabaki?
translation.es: No te reconocí sin tus chancletas. ¿Te refieres a mis uwabaki?

translation.en: Neela, right?
You're a quick learner.
So, where you from, anyway?
Here.
No. I mean, not where you live. Where'd you come from?
translation.es: No dónde vives, sino, ¿de dónde eres?

translation.en: Does it really matter where I'm from?
Who's the tourist?
What's with you and the schoolgirls, D?
You're moving up in the world. You gotta elevate your company.
translation.es: Estás ascendiendo. Tienes que subir de categoría.

translation.en: Wednesday, Wednesday, meet Thursday. God. Girl.
translation.es: Miércoles, te presento a la del jueves.

translation.en: Ladies, hold that thought, all right? All right, beautiful. Hold up.
He was just leaving. ( speaking Japanese )
I'm sorry. I don't speak Japanese.
Understand that? Gaijin?
We were just talking.
This isn't your scene.
That word you called me, gaijin or something or other,
translation.es: No entiendes. Esa palabra que usaste, gaijin, o algo así...

translation.en: what does that mean exactly?
Means, turn around, keep walking.
translation.es: Quiere decir: da media vuelta... Y lárgate.

translation.en: That's exactly what we gonna do. Come on, man, let's roll.
Yo, look, man, he's Yakuza.
Now, see, that's funny,
'cause I thought this was, like, a free country
translation.es: Yo creía que este era un país libre...

translation.en: Where a girl could talk to whoever she wants.
translation.es: Yo creía que este era un país libre... donde las muchachas hablaban con quien les diera la gana.

translation.en: You know who I am, boy?
Yeah.
translation.es: ¿Sabes quién soy, mocoso? Sí. Eres como el Justin Timberlake del Japón, ¿no?

translation.en: You're like the Justin Timberlake of Japan, right?
translation.es: Sí. Eres como el Justin Timberlake del Japón, ¿no?

translation.en: Leave.
Damn, man. You know Yakuza? The Mafia?
translation.es: Carajo, ¿no sabes que la yakuza es la Mafia?

translation.en: Look, sorry, DK-san. Monkey didn't have his banana today.
translation.es: Perdón, D.K., al monito no le dieron su banana.

translation.en: Hey, D, let's go. It's time to race.
Hey, good luck, Timberlake.
You're the one that's lucky, 'cause I'm about to race.
translation.es: La suerte es tuya, porque me tengo que ir a competir.

translation.en: Then let's race.
With what, huh? Your skateboard?
Easy to sound cocky when you got no ride.
translation.es: Es fácil alardear sin poder competir.

translation.en: Take mine.
Let's race.
What? I wanna see what the kid's got.
Can he drive?
Can he drive?
You know what DK stands for?
Donkey Kong?
Drift King.
Drift?
What do you mean, drift?
Still need a dictionary?
You know that real famous painting?
The one of the woman who's smiling all the time? The Mona Lisa.
translation.es: ¿El de la mujer de la sonrisa?

translation.en: Right, right, right, right. Mona Lisa.
Well, look, man, this car right here's like the Mona Lisa of the drift world.
translation.es: Pues este auto es como la Mona Lisa.

translation.en: Han rebuilt this bad boy from ground up.
We talking forged pistons,
translation.es: Lo reconstruyó totalmente. Tiene émbolos forjados, compresor nuevo, cigüeñal nuevo.

translation.en: bigger turbo, new rods, new crankshaft.
translation.es: Tiene émbolos forjados, compresor nuevo, cigüeñal nuevo.

translation.en: Hey, man, Han's labor ain't cheap, man, you feel me?
Well, if I needed a 30-second lesson on how to drift--
translation.es: Si necesitara una clase de patinaje...

translation.en: All right, look, man. There's lots of ways you can do this, all right?
Hand braking is the easiest, so the first thing I want you
translation.es: Una es el freno de mano.

translation.en: to do, I want you to rip that e-brake. All right?
translation.es: Luego, quiero que pises el acelerador.

translation.en: After you rip the e-brake, then I want you to power over.
translation.es: Y después que lo pises, quiero que recortes un poco.

translation.en: You know what? Just don't mess up Mona, all right?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Procura que Mona Lisa salga bien.

translation.en: All right.
Ready.
Set.
Go!
I told you.
Damn it!
Damn it!
Don't leave town.
Do you know what time it is?
I thought it was around 7 o'clock.
translation.es: Creí que era cerca de las 7:00.

translation.en: You know, U.S. is a few hours behind.
translation.es: Creí que era cerca de las 7:00. Tú sabes, es más tarde que en los Estados Unidos.

translation.en: Looks like the party was better here, anyway.
translation.es: Pero parece que esta fiesta fue mejor.

translation.en: Have you been racing, Sean?
You're out of here.
Go ahead.
You don't get it, do you?
You have nowhere else to go.
translation.es: No entiendes, ¿verdad? No tienes otro sitio donde ir.

translation.en: If it doesn't work out here, you're going to jail.
translation.es: No tienes otro sitio donde ir. Si aquí no te enderezas, vas preso, ¿entiendes?

translation.en: Do you get that?
translation.es: Si aquí no te enderezas, vas preso, ¿entiendes?

translation.en: This isn't a game. And I'm gonna tell you one more time,
translation.es: No es un juego. Y te lo voy a repetir.

translation.en: if you're gonna live under my roof, you're gonna go by my rules or get out.
translation.es: Si vas a vivir conmigo, respeta mis reglas o lárgate.

translation.en: Understand?
Understand?
Yes, sir.
Get in.
I'll get you your money.
Why you talking like you have a choice?
translation.es: Conseguiré tu plata. No tienes otra opción.

translation.en: There's a guy in there with a paw that owes me some money.
translation.es: Ahí hay un tipo con una garra que me debe dinero.

translation.en: A paw?
Go get me my money.
Okay.
Han said, um...
okane.
Han said okane.
Let's go.
You're in the pickup and delivery business now.
I might call you once a week or once an hour.
translation.es: Desde ahora trabajas en cobros. Puede ser una vez a la semana o cada hora.

translation.en: I don't care if you're sick as a dog or in bed with Beyoncé.
translation.es: Puede ser una vez a la semana o cada hora. Aunque estés enfermo o en la cama con Beyoncé.

translation.en: I call, you show.
Only if you teach me how to drift.
translation.es: Si te llamo, vienes. -Sólo si me enseñas a patinar. -No estamos negociando.

translation.en: This ain't a negotiation.
translation.es: -Sólo si me enseñas a patinar. -No estamos negociando.

translation.en: I wasn't negotiating.
translation.es: -Sólo si me enseñas a patinar. -No estamos negociando. No estaba negociando.

translation.en: What's he doing here?
He's paying me back for that crumpled beer can sitting in my garage.
translation.es: Me está pagando la chatarra que ahora está en mi garaje.

translation.en: Hope he's not driving.
Gaijin.
When is your next race? I'd really like to be there.
Why not be in it?
You heard me.
Ready to lose another car, Han?
I'm ready to take that '86 Corolla off your hands.
translation.es: ¿Vas a perder otro auto, Han? Quiero quitarte de las manos ese Corolla.

translation.en: All right.
Put up the '72 Skyline.
Done.
What do you think, Morimoto, huh?
Get him out of here.
We have business to discuss.
Your shipment's late.
Since when are you so worried about the details?
When is the shipment arriving, Han?
Just sit pretty and let me handle it.
Hey, Dad, it's me.
I had to stay after school for some extracurricular activities.
translation.es: Papá, soy yo. Tengo asuntos extracurriculares.

translation.en: So I'll be home a little later.
translation.es: Tengo asuntos extracurriculares. Voy a llegar tarde.

translation.en: Sir.
You really need to stop following me around.
What are you doing here?
I thought I'd stop by and ask your boyfriend for some drifting lessons.
translation.es: ¿Qué haces aquí? Vine a pedirle clases de patinaje a tu novio.

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.es: Vine a pedirle clases de patinaje a tu novio. Créeme, este mundo no es para ti.

translation.en: You don't wanna be a part of this world.
translation.es: Créeme, este mundo no es para ti.

translation.en: It's good enough for you.
translation.es: A ti te ha ido bien.

translation.en: You don't know anything about me.
translation.es: A ti te ha ido bien. No sabes nada de mí.

translation.en: Well, why don't you think I know?
'Cause I'm a gaijin? An outsider?
Let me guess.
You're an army brat who moved around a lot.
translation.es: Déjame ver. Tu padre era militar y se mudaban mucho.

translation.en: Your mama and daddy was never home.
translation.es: Tu padre era militar y se mudaban mucho. Tu papá y tu mamá nunca estaban en casa.

translation.en: So you walked around pissed off all the time
translation.es: Tu papá y tu mamá nunca estaban en casa. Y tú andabas rabiosa todo el tiempo.

translation.en: and now you found your family with these drift nuts.
translation.es: Y tú andabas rabiosa todo el tiempo. Y estos locos ahora son tu familia.

translation.en: Zero for one, cowboy.
Why can't you go find a nice Japanese girl like the rest of the white guys around here?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no buscas una japonesita, como hacen todos?

translation.en: Is everything okay back there?
I can handle DK.
I thought he's Yakuza.
His uncle's Yakuza.
He's just playing gangster in his little storage room.
translation.es: Él sólo juega a los hampones en su despachito.

translation.en: But I need him.
He keeps Uncle Kamata from poking around too much.
translation.es: Él impide que el tío Kamata meta las narices.

translation.en: What do you mean?
Well, his uncle gets a piece of the action from everyone on his turf.
translation.es: ¿Qué quieres decir? El tío recibe parte de los negocios de su territorio.

translation.en: We're on his turf.
50 percent of something is better than 100 percent of nothing.
translation.es: 50% de algo es mejor que 100% de nada.

translation.en: So have you raced DK?
Why not? Is he that good?
What's the point of a race?
To see if I'm better than the other guy.
translation.es: Para ver si soy mejor que el otro.

translation.en: Just proves you're faster, that's all.
translation.es: Sólo sabrías que eres más veloz.

translation.en: If I were to race, it would have to be for something important.
translation.es: Yo sólo competiría por algo más importante, si no...

translation.en: Or why else do it at all?
translation.es: Yo sólo competiría por algo más importante, si no... ¿para qué?

translation.en: Why are you letting me race?
'Cause you're DK's kryptonite.
translation.es: ¿Por qué me dejas manejar? Eres la kriptonita de D.K. Y me debes un auto.

translation.en: And you owe me a car.
Oh, shit.
What the--
Police cars here are only factory-tuned.
translation.es: La policía sólo usa autos de fábrica.

translation.en: You can do better than 180k, they can't catch you, so they don't even try.
translation.es: A más de 180 Km/hr no pueden alcanzarte y ni se molestan.

translation.en: You know what? I'm beginning to like this country already.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué? Ha empezado a gustarme este país.

translation.en: Danny!
Oh, you're looking good.
Disco.
We gotta catch up. Get you a drink on me, huh?
Let's go.
Uh-oh. Easy now, ladies.
Come on.
What's up? How you doing?
Hey, baby.
Keep your hands off the kid, girls. He's underage.
translation.es: No lo manoseen. Es menor de edad.

translation.en: Ladies, ladies, ladies. Disneyland for grownups, huh?
All these girls, man, they look like--
What, models? Check it out.
See, Tokyo is the fashion capital on this side of the planet, all right? Now, imagine you been posing all day.
translation.es: Tokio es la capital de la moda de este lado del planeta.

translation.en: I mean, that's a lot of hard work.
translation.es: Imagínate que has posado todo el día. Es un trabajo duro.

translation.en: Not only do you get tired, but, on top of that,
translation.es: Imagínate que has posado todo el día. Es un trabajo duro. Estás agotado...

translation.en: you wanna have a little fun, but you can't
'cause you don't even know nobody in town.
translation.es: buscando diversión, pero no conoces a nadie en la ciudad.

translation.en: And most of the guys around here are too chicken shit to even try picking up one.
translation.es: buscando diversión, pero no conoces a nadie en la ciudad. Y como la mayoría de los tipos no se atreven a ligar...

translation.en: So what do you do?
Man, you talk to the little dude who makes you laugh.
translation.es: ¿qué haces? Vienes a conversar con quien te hace reír.

translation.en: Yeah.
Look, man, I don't just think outside the box. I tear it up.
translation.es: Mira, amigo, soy un tipo original y singular.

translation.en: That's my thing.
Sean!
-The red Evo's yours. -♪ There it go ♪
translation.es: El tuyo es el Evo rojo.

translation.en: What do you mean?
You're representing me now.
What you think, I'm gonna let you roll in a Hyundai?
translation.es: ¿Iba a dejar que mi agente compitiera en un Hyundai?

translation.en: Oh, man.
Damn it.
My mother, she's blind in one eye and she can drift better than that.
translation.es: Mi madre es tuerta y patina mejor que eso.

translation.en: Han, where did you find this guy?
Will someone please teach this guy how to drift?
Is that yours?
Sure is.
What happened?
I don't know. I found it this way at the base.
translation.es: No sé. Así estaba en la base militar.

translation.en: It's got potential.
Yeah, maybe. We'll see.
You know, Sean, the Japanese have a saying.
translation.es: Sabes, Sean, hay un dicho japonés...

translation.en: The nail that sticks out gets hammered.
You're gonna be late.
Sean!
Come on, man, you broke it.
translation.es: ¡Eso es por venderme un iPod roto! ¡Vamos, lo rompiste tú!

translation.en: Hey, whoa, whoa.
There must be a misunderstanding.
Out of my way, or you're next.
translation.es: Quítate del medio, o te toca.

translation.en: Take it easy.
Hey, look, man, I don't do refunds, all right?
Okay, let's go, then!
Let's go!
Here.
Try not to break this one.
Say, man! What the hell is wrong with you, huh?
Now everybody's gonna want exchanges around here.
Damn!
Not easy saving the day, is it?
Maybe you could give me some pointers sometime.
You're doing all right.
translation.es: Dime qué debo hacer. Vas bien.

translation.en: Thanks.
Hey.
Yeah?
Sorry about the other night.
Your life isn't any of my business.
translation.es: Perdóname lo que dije. Tu vida no es asunto mío.

translation.en: It's okay.
Foul!
Ain't no damn foul. That was a foul.
-Yo, you in my face. -That was a foul.
Hey, Han, sort this wanker out.
-A wanker? -What do I look like, a zebra?
So, how did you end up over here, anyway?
Well, you know those old Westerns
translation.es: ¿Cómo llegaste a parar aquí? ¿Has visto esas películas de vaqueros...

translation.en: where the cowboys make a run for the border?
translation.es: ¿Has visto esas películas de vaqueros... donde huyen a la frontera?

translation.en: This is my Mexico.
Why'd you let me race with your car?
You knew I was gonna wreck it.
translation.es: ¿Por qué me prestaste tu auto? Sabías que lo iba a desbaratar.

translation.en: Why not?
'Cause it's a lot of money.
I have money.
It's trust and character I need around me.
translation.es: Quiero rodearme de gente de confianza.

translation.en: You know, who you choose to be around you lets you know who you are.
translation.es: "Dime con quién andas y te diré quién eres."

translation.en: And one car in exchange for knowing what a man's made of,
translation.es: Y si lo que me cuesta es un auto...

translation.en: that's a price I can live with.
Look at all those people down there.
They follow the rules, for what?
They're letting fear lead them.
What happens if they don't?
Life's simple. You make choices and you don't look back.
translation.es: La vida es sencilla. Hay que ser decidido, sin mirar atrás.

translation.en: So, if you don't drift to win, what do you drift for?
translation.es: Si no compites para ganar, ¿por qué lo haces?

translation.en: You really want to know? Yeah.
Okay. Let's go.
There's no "wax on, wax off" with drifting.
translation.es: Esto no se aprende en los libros.

translation.en: Learn by doin' it.
The first drifters invented drifting out here in the mountains by feeling it.
translation.es: Fue inventado en las montañas, por gente que lo sentía.

translation.en: So feel it.
Again!
What's in this bag?
You'll see.
translation.es: -¿Qué hay en la mochila? -Ya verás. ¿Cuánto tienes? Sigue, sigue.

translation.en: How much you got? Keep going, keep going.
I'm so good, man, I could sell rubbers to a monk.
Again.
Again.
Watch it. Watch it. Not too early, now.
Go, go, go, go!
Don't lose it! Don't lose it!
Hey, Twink. Get this man a bunk.
Pleasure doing business.
Yeah, baby. I told you. I told you, didn't I?
translation.es: Te lo dije. Te lo dije, ¿no?

translation.en: It's actually not bad. I didn't even have to put ketchup on it.
translation.es: No sabe mal. No tuve que echarle salsa de tomate.

translation.en: See, I'm not a total gaijin.
I hate that word. It's what they used to call me when I was a kid.
translation.es: ¡Cómo odio esa palabra! Así me decían cuando era niña.

translation.en: I thought you were born here.
Well, "outsider" can mean many different things.
My mom died when I was 10.
She came out here from Australia when she finished high school.
translation.es: Había venido de Australia cuando terminó la escuela.

translation.en: And all I know about her is that she went to work in a hostess bar.
translation.es: Lo único que sé de ella es que trabajaba en una cantina.

translation.en: DK's grandmother took me in.
translation.es: La abuela de D.K. me recogió.

translation.en: Well, my parents split up when I was three.
translation.es: Mis padres se separaron cuando yo tenía 3.

translation.en: Me and Mom moved around a lot.
translation.es: Mis padres se separaron cuando yo tenía 3. Mamá y yo nos mudamos mucho, mayormente por culpa mía.

translation.en: Mostly 'cause of me.
translation.es: Mamá y yo nos mudamos mucho, mayormente por culpa mía.

translation.en: Well, it was all 'cause of me.
Kind of made myself an outsider,
you know, without even thinking about it.
translation.es: Me convertí en forastero, ¿sabes? Sin pensarlo.

translation.en: But I realize now, outsider or insider, it doesn't really matter.
translation.es: Ahora sé que no importa si uno es forastero o no.

translation.en: All that matters is knowing what you really want and going after it.
translation.es: Hay que tener una meta... y luchar por ella.

translation.en: We used to come up here when we were kids.
Even before we could drive we'd cut class, sneak out,
translation.es: Veníamos aquí cuando éramos niños. Aun sin licencia, nos escapábamos y veníamos...

translation.en: come up here, and watch the older kids drift.
translation.es: a ver competir a los mayores.

translation.en: Things were different back then.
Once I got my license, I practically lived up here.
translation.es: Cuando tuve licencia, casi vivía aquí.

translation.en: Back then, kids just drove whatever they had.
You know, we just made do.
translation.es: Manejábamos lo que tuviéramos. Lo que fuera. Nadie nos estorbaba.

translation.en: No one bothered us.
translation.es: Lo que fuera. Nadie nos estorbaba.

translation.en: The day I got my license is the day I got my first speeding ticket.
translation.es: El mismo día que recibí mi licencia me dieron mi primera multa.

translation.en: The day after that, I won my first race.
translation.es: Al otro día, gané mi primera carerra.

translation.en: I beat this rich kid by three lengths.
translation.es: Le gané a un niño rico, por 3 cuerpos.

translation.en: I gotta admit, it felt good.
translation.es: Lo confieso, me sentí en las nubes.

translation.en: It felt like--
Like everything else just disappears.
No past and no future. No problems.
Just the moment.
Boy needs to chill.
Hey, Twink, I'm gonna grab another set.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!
Another set? No.
translation.es: ¿Qué? ¡Otras! Acabas de gastar el tercer juego. No son baratas.

translation.en: Look, that was your third set today. I mean, them tires ain't cheap.
translation.es: Acabas de gastar el tercer juego. No son baratas.

translation.en: DK, grab a chair. We're about to roast some marshmallows.
Yo, come on, man, look--
Stay away from her, or the only thing you'll be driving is a wheelchair.
translation.es: Déjala tranquila... o acabarás manejando una silla de ruedas.

translation.en: Find yourself a new driver.
I'm all right. What'd you expect?
You didn't just play with fire, you soaked the matches in gasoline.
translation.es: Estabas jugando con fuego, fósforos y gasolina.

translation.en: It's over.
All this over a gaijin? I am a gaijin.
You've changed, DK.
You say I've changed.
But we're not so different, you and I.
translation.es: Pero no somos distintos, tú y yo.

translation.en: We're both products of fuckups, aren't we?
translation.es: Somos el resultado de un fracaso, ¿no?

translation.en: They say your mom was the best trick
translation.es: Dicen que tu madre fue la mejor puta...

translation.en: in all of Kabukicho back in the day.
Leave my mother out of this.
translation.es: de todo Kabukicho. No metas a mi madre.

translation.en: If we hadn't taken you in, you'd be just like her,
translation.es: Si no te hubiésemos recogido estarías como ella...

translation.en: doing anything for a buck.
Think anyone would take a second look at you if it wasn't for your uncle?
translation.es: ¿Y dónde estarías tú si no fuera por tu tío?

translation.en: We're the same, Neela.
Difference is I know who I am and where I belong.
translation.es: Pero yo sé quién soy y sé mi lugar.

translation.en: Do you know who you are?
Do you know where you belong?
Hey.
Come on.
Uncle.
Uncle Kamata, I was just about to go see you.
translation.es: Tío Kamata, estaba a punto de ir a verte.

translation.en: Have you been well?
Yes.
Here's last week's take.
translation.es: Esta es la ganancia de la semana pasada.

translation.en: Business good?
Please.
To tell you the truth...
I look over these printouts of yours...
and I don't understand half of what I'm looking at.
translation.es: y no entiendo la mitad de lo que veo.

translation.en: It looks more complicated than it is.
translation.es: Parece más complicado de lo que es.

translation.en: Then how is it even I am able to figure out...
translation.es: ¿Entonces cómo se explica que me haya dado cuenta...

translation.en: that your partner is stealing from us?
translation.es: de que tu socio nos está robando?

translation.en: Even if that were true...
It couldn't have been much, uncle. I would've caught it.
translation.es: no podría ser mucho, tío. Lo hubiese descubierto.

translation.en: There's an old saying:
For want of a nail...
the horseshoe was lost.
For want of a horseshoe, the steed was lost.
translation.es: "Por fallar la herradura, se perdió el caballo".

translation.en: For want of a steed...
the message was not delivered.
For want of an undelivered message...
the war was lost.
I miss your father.
translation.es: Echo de menos a tu padre.

translation.en: Hey, brother.
I vouched for you! Put my reputation on the line for you!
translation.es: ¡Confié en ti! ¡Di mi palabra por ti!

translation.en: We were partners!
You think you can keep your side deals from me?
Come on. We ain't in the Boy Scouts.
translation.es: ¿Crees que me puedes engañar? ¡Ay, vamos! No somos niños exploradores.

translation.en: This is what we do. Takashi!
What about now?
Hmm? Is this what we do?
Man, you need me.
translation.es: ¿Este es el negocio? Tú me necesitas.

translation.en: You'd still be shaking down teahouses for chump change if it wasn't for me.
translation.es: Si no fuera por mí, seguirías robando negocios de mierda.

translation.en: Get in! Go! Go! Go!
Come on.
Sean. Sean!
Takashi.
I wouldn't do that if I were you.
translation.es: Si fuera tú, no lo haría.

translation.en: Okay.
I'll go with you.
See you when Daddy's not around.
I'm putting you on a plane tonight.
translation.es: -Esta noche te monto en un avión. -¡Papá!

translation.en: -Dad-- -Sean, don't argue with me.
translation.es: -Esta noche te monto en un avión. -¡Papá! No discutas.

translation.en: I did this. I can't run away.
translation.es: No discutas. Soy responsable. No puedo huir.

translation.en: I can't.
Sean, I'm your father. I'm responsible for your well-being.
translation.es: Sean, soy tu padre. Soy responsable por ti.

translation.en: And I'm responsible for my mess.
translation.es: Y yo del problema que causé.

translation.en: I gotta do this.
Can you understand that?
At least you're not redoing my mistakes.
translation.es: Al menos, no repites mis errores.

translation.en: You all right, man?
We're leaving town. Look, I know some people--
translation.es: Nos vamos de aquí. Conozco gente.

translation.en: I can't do it, Twink.
Look, DK wants your head. All right?
And the trouble you just made for Kamata? You're done here, bro.
translation.es: Y con el lío que le has armado a Kamata, estás frito.

translation.en: Maybe I should talk to Kamata. What?
DK answers to him.
translation.es: D.K. hace lo que él diga.

translation.en: I know I just didn't hear that.
I gotta end this. I'm gonna go talk to him.
translation.es: Hay que resolver esto. Voy a hablar con él.

translation.en: What, are you crazy, huh?
Han is dead, all right!
Plus, you can't just walk into Kamata's place, man!
translation.es: ¡No puedes ver a Kamata así como así!

translation.en: It's all I got.
Something I think Han would've wanted you to have.
translation.es: Creo que Han te hubiese dado esto.

translation.en: What's this?
You're gonna need it if you're gonna make it out of Kamata's place alive.
translation.es: Te hará falta para salir vivo de donde Kamata.

translation.en: Don't you need it?
No, it's cool. Look, I'll figure it out.
I'd like to see Mr. Kamata, please.
translation.es: Quiero ver al Sr. Kamata, por favor.

translation.en: Sean.
You need to leave.
You came to the wrong place.
I didn't come here to see you.
Who's your friend?
Nobody.
I can handle this.
I have something which belongs to you sir.
translation.es: Tengo algo que es suyo, señor.

translation.en: You think you can walk in here,
translation.es: ¿Piensas... que puedes entrar, dejar la plata y largarte?

translation.en: dump some cash and walk out?
translation.es: que puedes entrar, dejar la plata y largarte?

translation.en: I know I'm only returning what belonged to you in the first place, sir.
translation.es: Sé que estoy devolviéndole lo que era suyo, señor.

translation.en: But that's not why I really came.
I came here to apologize.
I know your nephew and I have embarrassed ourselves badly.
translation.es: Su sobrino y yo nos hemos portado indignamente.

translation.en: Sir, I'm here to offer you a peaceful solution.
translation.es: Vine a proponer una solución pacífica.

translation.en: How do you plan to accomplish that?
A race.
DK and I have caused nothing but problems for you, for us.
translation.es: D.K. y yo hemos sido motivo de aprietos para Ud. y para nosotros.

translation.en: And I'm asking you to allow us to settle this, once and for all.
translation.es: Pido que nos deje decidir esto de forma final.

translation.en: We race
and the loser leaves town for good.
translation.es: El que pierda se va, para siempre.

translation.en: I've already beat this piece of shit once!
Good.
translation.es: ¡Ya le gané una vez! Me alegro.

translation.en: Then it should be easy.
The cops took all the cars.
translation.es: La policía se llevó los autos.

translation.en: Hey!
That's why she's spitting.
We almost there, Twink. Couple more tweaks.
translation.es: Falta poco, Twinkie. Un par de ajustes más.

translation.en: It's not the car I'm worried about, man.
DK picked this road for a reason. This is his mountain.
translation.es: D.K. escogió esta ruta por algo. Ésta es su montaña.

translation.en: He's the only one to ever make it to the bottom.
translation.es: Es el único que ha llegado abajo.

translation.en: Yeah!
-Yeah! -Yeah!
( grunts )
-Yeah! -Come on!
-Woo! -Come on, Sean.
Sean's the boss. Let's go.
Damn! Come on, man! That ain't right.
Yeah, baby!
That's what I'm talking about, man.
I told you!
Hey, yo, Sean! Yo, Sean!
Hey, check this out, man.
This dude over here wanna race the new DK.
translation.es: Hay un tipo que te quiere retar.

translation.en: Heard he's been beating everybody around Asia, too.
translation.es: Hay un tipo que te quiere retar. Dicen que ha ganado por todo el Oriente.

translation.en: Not tonight, Twinkie.
Said he knew Han.
Said Han was family.
All right. Let's race.
Nice ride.
I won it from our friend Han a few years ago.
translation.es: Lindo automóvil. Se lo gané a nuestro amigo Han, hace unos años.

translation.en: I didn't know he was into American muscle.
He was when he was rolling with me.
translation.es: ¿Le gustaban los autos americanos? Cuando andaba conmigo.

translation.en: You know this ain't no 10-second race.
translation.es: No es una carrera de 10 segundos.

translation.en: I got nothing but time.
You ready, kid?
Come on, Sean! Come on!
Ready!
Set!
Go!
♪ Rock, I rock ♪
♪ I rock, I rock, I rock ♪
♪ I roll, I roll, I roll ♪
translation.es: CON PERSONAL ESPECIALIZADO. NADIE DEBE DE TRATAR DE DUPLICAR

translation.en: ♪ Rock, I rock ♪
translation.es: NADIE DEBE DE TRATAR DE DUPLICAR

translation.en: ♪ I rock, I rock, I rock ♪
